name: Hyperdrome (itch)
description:
This is a 3D shooter prototype / on-hold project with a few special features:

- The weapons swap themselves in an ongoing cycle after a period of time/emptying the magazine/hitting enemies X times. You cannot reload nor change them yourself.

- Rounds go on infinitely until you kill a number of golden enemies, take the ring they drop and deliver them to the small dome in each level.

CONTROLS:

- WASD for movement + Spacebar to jump

- Left click to shoot

- Right click to aim (there is no visual representation of it, but it works)

- Q to dash

- F to deliver the pieces when near the dome
